short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A scraper that scrapes twitter for contract addresses and lets you use uniswap to swap their tokens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension parses addresses that show up on your twitter feed and turns them into clickable links. These links can link to Uniswap which allows you to connect your Metamask wallet and swap your coins.
